verbs.description: As [ARG0: the Trump administration] [V: offers] [ARG1: inconsistent justifications for separating migrant children from their parents at the US - Mexico border] , an interview has resurfaced in which John Kelly , then the secretary of homeland security , suggested the policy could help deter illegal immigration .
